dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5099 IH: To amend the National Institute of Standards and Technology Act to remove the National Security Agency from the list of the entities consulted during the development of information systems standards and guidelines.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grayson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

form.official-title: To amend the National Institute of Standards and Technology Act to remove the National Security Agency from the list of the entities consulted during the development of information systems standards and guidelines.

section.text: Section 20(c)(1) of the National Institute of Standards and Technology Act (15 U.S.C. 278gâ€“3(c)(1)) is amended by striking the National Security Agency,.
